title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 305: Featuring Alex Tuch + Derek Sanderson
description:
On episode 305 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, we are joined by Alex Tuch and Derek Sanderson. Alex joined (02:33) to talk about the bubble, his time in Vegas, growing up in the Syracuse area and a bunch more. We are then joined by Derek Sanderson (01:04:02), who returned to the podcast to discuss his sobriety and the modern day NHL. Whit wraps up with a tribute to the late great Travis Roy.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
